column4: wine is downloaded and i am trying to run tukanas hit generator using wine... when i download it it says error writing to the temporary location... how do i get it to work?
does anyone know how to wrok wine
Well you should only use Wine to install it not to download it. You may have to set write permissions
Well where did you download it?
And it doesn't bring up the installing window?
Do a terminal and run sudo /home/acorn/Desktop/Tukanas Hit Generator.exe
But if you can chmod your home .wine folder would be better
Yes, should be it, if that's your file
Except they are driving more people towards Ubuntu
I just read your thing, Geek Squad doesn't know anything about computers, they just have an automated CD
